price: İşte durum bu. Bir de Allah, kâfirlerin tuzağını zayıf düşürendir.
arabic: ذَٰلِكُمۡ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ مُوهِنُ كَيۡدِ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: dhālikum wa-anna al-laha mūhinu kaydi al-kāfirīna
